name: YEET in the dark
description:
-Global Gamejam 2021 submission 
https://globalgamejam.org/2021/games/yeet-dark-8
YEET in the dark is a 2D platformer where you have to find your way through the darkness throwing flares. Instructions are available from the main menu. All Assets were created during the jam.

Racoon Team info: 

- Philippe Beauchemin : Design / Programming

- Benjamin Chouinard : Programming / Design

- Étienne Lafrance : Pixel Art / UI

- Catherine Verret : Pixel Art/ Animation/Tech art

- Nicolas Clemesac : Sound Design

- Samuel Deschênes : Design / Programming 

Feel free to contact Samuel at ld.samuel.deschenes@gmail.com to get in touch with any of the participants.
